ComicInfo.Summary: Brothers-In-Arms: Thy Brother's Keeper: Craven has captured John Lynch and Deathblow teams up with the Gen kids to get him back. As they are sneaking into the complex, however, Roxy lights up a cigarette and sets off the alarms.
